name: Puro's Basement [FANGAME]
description:
STORY: Bloky decided to go on a basement for a project. But the basement is not safe

and some one is going trough the hallways

bruh a baldis unreal basic and changed fangame

Why does look everything like a 5$ budget?

Well my internet was shutdown for 2 days and I couldn't do pixelarts so I used MS Paint and my sound effects all by myself. Aaaand the controlls are bad.

and this game is werid.
